label: Block Investment — TF-IDF (no model)
wrong: FN: 'Should I invest in Tesla?'                                  — direct investment advice request
FN: 'Should I put money in the S&P 500?'                         — index fund question
FN: 'Is it a good time to invest in crypto?'                     — crypto timing question
FN: 'How much should I invest each month?'                       — investment amount advice
FN: 'What are the top performing funds this year?'               — fund performance query
FN: 'Should I sell my shares?'                                   — sell advice
FN: "What's the yield on treasury bonds?"                        — bond yield query
FN: "What's the PE ratio of Amazon?"                             — stock analysis question
FN: "What's the best crypto wallet?"                             — crypto wallet recommendation
FN: 'How do I buy Ethereum?'                                     — crypto purchase how-to
FN: 'Is Vanguard better than Fidelity?'                          — brokerage comparison
FN: 'Should I invest in AI companies?'                           — sector investment advice
FN: "What's the best way to invest $10000?"                      — investment amount advice
FN: 'Can you explain dollar cost averaging?'                     — investment strategy education
FN: 'Should I buy shares in this airline?'                       — buying airline shares — investment
FN: "What's the return on airline bonds?"                        — airline bonds — investment despite airline topic
FN: 'Should I invest in aviation sector funds?'                  — aviation sector investing
FP: 'My flight was cancelled, what are my options?'              — emirates — cancellation help
FP: 'Is this product in stock?'                                  — inventory — stock means inventory
FP: 'Can you stock up on more supplies?'                         — restock — stock means replenish
FP: 'What options are available in the menu?'                    — options menu — not financial options
FP: 'I need to bond with my team'                                — team bonding — not financial bonds
FP: 'The gold standard for quality'                              — gold standard idiom
FP: "What's the trading card worth?"                             — trading cards — not stock trading
FP: "I'm not interested in investing"                            — negation — user declining
FP: 'My portfolio of work is on my website'                      — work portfolio — not investment
FP: 'The market was busy this morning'                           — farmers market or bazaar — not stock market
FP: "That's a capital idea!"                                     — capital — great idea not capital gains
FP: 'What are my options for dinner tonight?'                    — options — dinner not financial
FP: "What's the price of extra legroom?"                         — price — seat upgrade not stock price
FN: 'Where should I put my money to make it grow?'               — paraphrase — invest without saying invest
FN: "What's a good place to park my cash long-term?"             — paraphrase — invest using 'park cash'
FN: 'What should I do with my spare cash?'                       — paraphrase — investment advice without financial terms
FN: "What's the smartest thing to do with $50k?"                 — paraphrase — investment advice for lump sum
FN: 'I want to purchase some equities'                           — synonym — purchase instead of buy, equities instead of stocks
FN: 'How does the FTSE 100 look today?'                          — synonym — FTSE instead of S&P/Nasdaq
FN: 'What are the best performing portfolios?'                   — stemming — portfolios plural
FN: 'Any good investors I should follow?'                        — stemming — investors noun form
FP: 'My flight leaves from Terminal 3 at the market end of the airport' — false positive guard — market in non-financial airport context
